name: Demolition Paradise
description:
Description:

In the distant future where wrecking balls have been outlawed since an event only known as "The Miley Cyrus incident" demolition companies have transitioned to a new form of destructive tool: the Bomb Oriented Mechanical Bomb or B.O.M.B for short. 

This new futuristic technology blows up a series of tiny bombs in order to move a much larger bomb to the demolition site at such a velocity that the B.O.M.B explodes on impact. perfectly destroying the target.

Gameplay:

Every Building is surrounded by a protective force field... except for one. Navigate the maze to find the correct building until you have exploded every single one.

You do not control the B.O.M.B directly. Instead, you move the mini bomb and explode it to effectively "Pick the side" that the bomb goes quickly enough before you crash into a wall or force field.

If you touch anything that isn't the correct building (Including the floor) you lose.

Controls:

left-right arrows: move the MiniBomb

Space: Explode Bomb

Z: stop Bomb

R: Restart
